requirements.description: Your use, collection, and sharing of mobile device advertising identifiers and other personal information can only be implemented if your privacy policy describes these practices.

type.summary: Description of Data Use by You and Third Parties

requirements.description: Your privacy policy must include the use of information for behaviorally targeted online advertising.
Your privacy policy must provide an opt-out link directing users to an industry-recognized opt-out from online behavioral advertising.
You must provide California users the ability to opt-out from the sale of their information.
